name: OUT OF THE DARK (Roberto Cádiz)
description:
In this demo you will see the first level of the principal game.

You will be Little Me, he is a little penguin, a newborn.  He is alone and  afraid. You will have to solve the mystery of the world.

Is that the real world?

Or just his subconscious...

The game will be soon updated. The update will include the enemies.
